name: YouTube Fullscreen Live Stream w/ Chat Room
description: Press F11 and enjoy the fullscreen goodness of YouTube live streams with chat room. YouTube's chat room design leaves a lot to be desired, but this code allows for a more enjoyable experience.
additional_info: Style Settings Chat Room Font Size: Choose between the original or a larger size. Chat Room Profile Images: Reduce the size of profile images, or hide them altogether. Chat Room Author Colour: Select a colour to be used for chat room usernames. Darker Theme: Enable an even darker theme. YouTube Dark theme must be enabled before enabling this. Remove AM/PM: Hides AM/PM from timestamp.
